title: Universe/Frames/AxesFrozen
description: Configuration for AxesFrozen axes in frames plugin (i.e. freezing rotation from parent to reference at epoch + optional delta)

epoch.description: Epoch at which rotation is frozen

reference.description: Name of axes to which rotation is frozen

parent.description: Name of axes from which rotation is frozen

delta.description: (optionally parameterized) time correction to be applied to epoch
